select
from TEAM where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and DELETED='N'

select count(*) from TEAM where `DELETED` = 'N'
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '%${searchValue}%' )

update TEAM

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
